name: Shave this bald head!
description:
A game about shaving bald heads.

You can save the world - shave heads and get the best scores, upload your score on the leaderboard

Use a mouse to control the sponge

Use Left Mouse Button to start shave head

RoboMarchello - Programming, art, idea

SFX used: crunchy ui 50 SFX by AdamSauners
